sub_title: International Sales Leader | Perfumes, Cosmetics & Consumer Goods
summary:
I am an international Sales Leader with over twelve years of experience in the Perfumes, cosmetics and consumer goods industry in Europe and Asia, leading the marketing and sales strategies for local markets, distributors, and travel retail operators.

Since 2013 I have held senior sales and operational roles with Coty, an American-French multinational beauty company that develops, manufactures, markets, and distributes fragrances, cosmetics, and skincare products. 

I have an outstanding track record of delivering year-on-year growth, securing international contracts with major retailers, driving growth in offline and online channels, and managing large, geographically dispersed teams.

A true relationship builder, I am straight to the point, encourage efficient discussions and manage through empathy, resilience, and active listening.

I am trilingual (French, English, Spanish) and hold a Master’s in International Business from ICN Business School (Metz, France) and a Logistics Master’s from UNC (Mendoza, Argentina).

education.field_of_study: Logistics, Materials, and Supply Chain Management

profile_positions.description:
Following three highly successful years in sales leadership roles in Singapore, I relocated to Amsterdam as Senior Sales Manager for European Distributor Markets in seven countries (Poland, Czech, Slovakia, Hungary, Finland, and the Baltics).

Key Responsibilities & Achievements:
•	Regional lead for ‘Consumer Beauty’ (7 brands including Max Factor and Rimmel) and ‘Luxury’ (12 brands including Gucci, Hugo Boss, Burberry, Chloe, and Calvin Klein)
•	Leading teams from five external distributors, developing their strategic marketing plans, managing their P&L, and ensuring they are delivering a best-in-industry service
•	Leading trade plan creation and implementation, managing the profitability of each account by ensuring ROI on investments to reach the top-line targets, including CapEx merchandising and media spending
•	Driving in-store strategy to bring brand awareness and sales, positioning Coty products favourably vs the competition
•	Designing, negotiating, and deploying the international contracts for the Europe Distributor 
•	Secured international contracts with Douglas, AS Watson and Sephora
•	Led optimisation of retailer's e-commerce performance by increasing our CARS (content, assortment, rate & review, search) by 27 pts in 2022 and managing retail media investments
